alien4cloud.utils

Class ReflectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • alien4cloud.utils.ReflectionUtil

  • public final class ReflectionUtil
extends Object
    Utility class to help working with java reflection.

    • Method Detail

      • getGenericArgumentType

        public static <T> Class<?> getGenericArgumentType(Class<? extends T> implementationClass,
                                                  Class<T> genericClass,
                                                  int index)
        Get the Class of the generic argument of a generic class based on it's implementation class.
        Parameters:
        implementationClass - The implementation class that actually is a sub-class of generic class.
        genericClass - The generic class for which to get the argument type.
        index - The index of the argument.
        Returns:
        null if the type cannot be found, the generic type when found.

        Type Parameters:
        T - generic annotation type
        Parameters:
        clazz - the parent class
        annotationClass - the annotation type to search
        property - the property to search for annotation
        Returns:
        annotation

        public static void mergeObject(Object from,
                               Object to,
                               boolean ignoreNullValue,
                               Set<String> ignores)
        Merge object from an object to another. Failsafe : resist to invalid property.
        Parameters:
        from - source of the update
        to - target of the update
        ignoreNullValue - indicate if we should merge null value
        ignores - properties names that should be ignored

        public static boolean isPrimitiveOrWrapperOrString(Class<?> clazz)
        Return true if the given class is a primitive type, a primitive wrapper or a String.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
